name: Landscape Conversion Rebate
description: Up to $4 per sq ft for converting lawn and/or swimming pool to sustainable, low-water-use landscape; artificial turf not eligible
fullDescription: City of Palo Alto offers rebates for converting water-intensive lawns and pools to sustainable, drought-tolerant landscaping through a partnership with Valley Water.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $4 per square foot rebate
- For lawn to low-water landscape conversion
- For swimming pool removal and conversion
- Sustainable landscaping options
- Significant water savings
- Artificial turf not eligible
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a City of Palo Alto water customer
2. Apply through Valley Water before starting
3. Get project pre-approved
4. Convert lawn or pool to sustainable landscape
5. Complete project per guidelines
6. Submit final documentation for rebate
keywords: Palo Alto, CPAU, landscape conversion, lawn removal, pool removal, $4 per sq ft, drought tolerant, water savings, Valley Water
